query:
subscription SubscribeProgramUpdates($id: ID!) {
  updates: onProgramUpdated(programId: $id) {
    programId
    updateType
    program {
      ...UseProgramProgramData
      __typename
    }
    comment {
      ...UseProgramCommentWithUserData
      __typename
    }
    handout {
      ...UseProgramHandoutData
      __typename
    }
    video {
      ...UseProgramVideoData
      __typename
    }
    totalPlayTime
    __typename
  }
}

fragment UseProgramProgramData on Program {
  id
  channelId
  tenantId
  broadcastAt
  title
  detail
  mainTime
  previewTime
  release
  adminComment
  adminCommentDisappearAt
  tags
  tenantId
  title
  isExtensionChargedToSubscribers
  archivedAt
  releaseState
  shouldArchive
  __typename
}

fragment UseProgramCommentWithUserData on CommentWithUser {
  id
  tenantId
  programId
  text
  commentTime
  userId
  userName
  userIcon
  __typename
}

fragment UseProgramHandoutData on Handout {
  id
  name
  createdAt
  __typename
}

fragment UseProgramVideoData on Video {
  id
  mediaStatus
  liveUrl
  archiveUrl
  __typename
}
